com.mishmash.alpha.jsonhandling
Class ItemGatherer

java.lang.Object
  com.mishmash.alpha.jsonhandling.ItemGatherer

public class ItemGatherer
extends java.lang.Object

Util-type class used to get our data from a remote source. For expediency's sake, we are gathering everything all at once into a String. If the goal of the application was to search through larger JSON DB's, we should add new methods to this class that parse the data in smaller bites.

Method Detail

getSmallAmountOfTextDataFromSource

public static java.lang.String getSmallAmountOfTextDataFromSource(java.lang.String source)
Gets all of the data from the source destination and returns it as a String. This method is NOT SAFE for large data sets.

Parameters:
source - The location of the data.
Returns:
A string containing the data found at the source.

seperateCategories

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.google.gson.JsonArray> seperateCategories(java.lang.String rawData,
                                                                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> categoryTitles)
Separates the categories from the input JsonArray as determined by the input category titles.

Parameters:
rawData - The raw JSON data.
categoryTitles - A list of titles to look for in the data.
Returns:
Arrays of each of the input types, keyed by the type names.
